movie.title: Clash
movie.description_intro: Set entirely in an 8m police truck, a number of detainees from different political and social backgrounds are brought together by their inevitable fate, during the turmoil that followed the ousting of former president Morsi from power.
movie.description_full: Set entirely in an 8m police truck, a number of detainees from different political and social backgrounds are brought together by their inevitable fate, during the turmoil that followed the ousting of former president Morsi from power.

movies.title: Roar
movies.summary: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.
movies.description_full: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.
movies.synopsis: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.

movies.title: Queen: Days of Our Lives
movies.summary: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.
movies.description_full: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.
movies.synopsis: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.

movies.title: Asuran
movies.summary: Asuran is an action film directed by Vetrimaaran, with the story taken from the novel Vekkai
movies.description_full: Asuran is an action film directed by Vetrimaaran, with the story taken from the novel Vekkai
movies.synopsis: Asuran is an action film directed by Vetrimaaran, with the story taken from the novel Vekkai

movies.title: Monte Carlo
movies.summary: A young woman, her uptight step sister and her best friend use their savings for a long anticipated dream trip to Paris, which turns out to be a big disappointment. When they decide to take a break from their lousy tour and duck into the lobby of a luxury hotel, one of them is mistaken for a spoiled British heiress. Before they get the chance to reveal their true identities they are wrapped up in misadventures during a vacation to Monte Carlo instead.

Before they get the chance to reveal their true identities they are wrapped up in misadventures during a vacation to Monte Carlo instead.
